attributes.action: FA cup semi finals should be at a neutral ground that isn't Wembley
attributes.additional_details: The magic of getting to Wembley has been diluted by the fact that the FA cup Semi Final is also at Wembley stadium. There is also a consistent advantage for clubs in London as there is a lesser distance to travel than say Man City's fans for example, who if playing a London team may find less support because of the cost of travel been a factor.
